welcome.title: What is TW Values ?
welcome.content: TW Values is a political quiz for taiwanese.

q0000.description: It is necessary for the government to intervene in the economy to protect consumers.

q0001.description: Taxes should be increased on the rich to provide for the poor.

q0002.description: Basic utilities like roads and electricity should be publicly owned.

q0003.description: Quality education is a right of all people.

q0100.description: The freer the markets, the freer the people.

q0101.description: Inheritance is a legitimate form of wealth.

q0102.description: Government intervention is a threat to the economy.

q0103.description: Those with a greater ability to pay should receive better healthcare.

q1000.description: We are already indepedent, the name is 'Republic of China (R.O.C)'.

q1001.description: We need a new constitution for 'Republic of Taiwan'.

q1100.description: Taiwan is a province of 'People's Republic of China (PRC)'.

q1101.description: 'Republic of China (R.O.C)' is the sole legitimate government of China.

q1200.description: TODO: 加入歐美陣營，抗中保台。

q1201.description: TODO: 應加入CPTPP，增加國際貿易優勢。

q1301.description: TODO: 應重啟服貿與貨貿談判，以便從中國獲取更多經濟利益。
